snippet: Apple’s iCloud data service works best with Apple’s own devices, but it is possible to make it work with other companies’ hardware.
abstract: Personal Tech Q&A column; Apple’s iCloud data service works best with Apple’s own devices, but it is possible to make it work with other companies’ hardware; protecting phones from the cold temperatures when outside; Tip of the Week on new features for Android 4.4.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s iCloud data service works best with Apple’s own devices, but it is possible to make it work with other companies’ hardware.
